arlin.dataset.loaders.sb3_loaders.load_hf_sb_model(repo_id, filename, algo_str)

Load a stable-baselines3 model from huggingface.

Parameters:

  • repo_id (-) – Repo_ID where the model is stored on huggingface

  • filename (-) – Filename of the model zip within the repo on huggingface

  • algo_str (str) –

Returns:

Trained SB3 model

Return type:

  • BaseAlgorithm

arlin.dataset.loaders.sb3_loaders.load_sb_model(path, algo_str)

Load a stable-baselines3 model from a given path.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Path to the SB3 trained model zip.

  • algo_str (str) – Algorithm that was used to train the model.

Returns:

Trained SB3 model

Return type:

BaseAlgorithm
